system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Fencing Swords)}

Benefits

When wielding a sabre, cutlass, rapier, parrying dagger, sai, or jitte, the character receives a +2 bonus against all Disarm attempts to disarm the wielder and a +1 bonus against all attacks against their weapon. The character also gains a +2 attack bonus to all called shot attacks against arms and legs made when attacking with a sabre, cutlass, rapier, or parrying dagger and the Critical Threat range for any of these weapons is 13-18.

Normal

The Critical Threat range for a sabre, cutlass, rapier, or parrying dagger is 14-18.
system.summary: +2 Disarm bonus, +1 weapon defense, +2 called shot bonus, 13-18 crit
